title: #108: Vaccine Efficacy vs Natural Immunity - Holistic Health Masterclass
description: In this episode, investigative reporter, Jeremy Hammond joins me to discuss covid 19 vaccine effectiveness versus natural immunity.
cleaned_text: In this episode, investigative reporter, Jeremy Hammond joins me to discuss covid 19 vaccine effectiveness versus natural immunity. As the march towards endless rounds of boosters continues, is there a case to be made for natural immunity? Is natural immunity superior to vaccine-induced immunity? Is natural immunity durable and lasting? [Listen on your favourite podcast app ](https://link.chtbl.com/ep108) Here are the highlights: - Capturing and reporting on vaccine efficacy data - The definition of "fully vaccinated" - Measuring effectiveness - is it all about antibodies? - T-cells, B cells and innate immunity - Cross immunity between SARS-1 and SARS-Cov2 - Narrow immunity induced by mRNA shots - Original antigenic sin - theory - Immune escape - fact or fiction? - Antibody-dependent enhancement - Could we become dependent on boosters? - Negative vaccine efficacy? - Problems with grandfathering in of future vaccines - The muzzling of dissenting doctors - The war on informed consent - Omicron and moving from pandemic to endemic Additional Resources [Episode #77: Debunking propaganda](https://www.holistic-health-masterclass.com/podcast/debunking-propaganda/) [146 studies on natural immunity and covid-19](https://brownstone.org/articles/79-research-studies-affirm-naturally-acquired-immunity-to-covid-19-documented-linked-and-quoted/)(Brownstone Institute) Connect with Jeremy here: Support the show - Show sponsor - [Energybits Blue Green Algae](https://www.energybits.com/products.html)- 20% off all orders
